name: The Ultimate Flu Bomb
description: Barbara O'Neill's signature potent antimicrobial and immune-boosting tonic designed to halt respiratory infections at the onset.
usage: Crush 1 clove garlic, grate 1 tsp ginger, add juice of 1 lemon, 1 tsp honey, 1 drop eucalyptus oil, and a pinch of cayenne. Mix in half a cup of hot water. Take 3 times daily.

name: Liver Deep Cleanse Tea
description: A combination of bitter and alterative herbs that stimulate bile flow and assist the liver in filtering metabolic waste.
usage: Simmer the roots (decoction) for 15 minutes, add crushed milk thistle seeds at the end. Drink 1 cup before breakfast for 30 days.

name: The Anti-Inflammatory Poultice
description: A topical treatment designed to draw out inflammation and heat from localized injuries or chronic joint pain.
usage: Mix ingredients into a thick paste. Apply to the affected area, cover with a cloth and plastic wrap. Leave for 2-4 hours or overnight.

name: The Kidney Stone Dissolver
description: A lithotriptic blend that helps break down calcium deposits and flush the urinary tract.
usage: Decoct the roots for 20 minutes. Drink 3-4 cups daily until the stones pass.

name: The Lung Congestion Clearer
description: An expectorant formula that thins mucus and calms the bronchial tubes.
usage: Infuse the leaves and decoct the roots. Drink warm with honey as needed for breathing ease.

name: The Sleep Inducer (Nervine)
description: A sedative blend that calms the central nervous system without causing morning grogginess.
usage: Prepare as a strong infusion 30 minutes before bed. For chronic cases, use a tincture.

name: The Heart Tonic
description: A cardiotonic formula used to strengthen the heart muscle and regulate blood pressure.
usage: Standard decoction of Hawthorn berries. Add Motherwort and Ginkgo as an infusion. Take daily for 3 months.

name: The Joint Repair Decoction
description: High in minerals and silica, this blend supports the rebuilding of cartilage and connective tissue.
usage: Long-steep infusion (4+ hours) to extract maximum mineral content. Drink 2 cups daily.

name: The Parasite Purge
description: A powerful vermifuge designed to eliminate intestinal parasites and their eggs.
usage: Take as a tincture protocol: Increase dose gradually over 14 days, rest for 7 days, then repeat.

name: The Adrenal Revitalizer
description: Adaptogenic support for those suffering from chronic stress and 'burnout'.
usage: Take in the morning and early afternoon. Avoid late evening use as it may provide too much energy for sleep.

name: The Lymphatic Flush
description: Moves stagnant lymph fluid and reduces swelling in the glands.
usage: Mild infusion of the first three herbs. Use Poke root ONLY under professional guidance.

name: The Digestive Fire Builder
description: A bitter tonic to be taken before meals to stimulate hydrochloric acid and enzyme production.
usage: Prepare as a bitter tincture. Take 5-10 drops on the tongue 15 minutes before eating.

name: The Skin Recovery Salve
description: A topical oil-based treatment for healing damaged skin tissue and reducing scarring.
usage: Infuse herbs in olive oil for 4 weeks, strain, and thicken with melted beeswax. Apply liberally.

name: The Thyroid Support Blend
description: Provides the raw materials (iodine and minerals) necessary for healthy thyroid function.
usage: Incorporate into smoothies or take as a daily infusion. Monitor iodine levels.

name: The Brain Fog Lifter
description: Cerebral stimulants that increase oxygenation and blood flow to the brain.
usage: Morning tea or tincture. Best used in conjunction with deep breathing exercises.

name: The Blood Purifier
description: An alterative blend that cleanses the bloodstream of metabolic toxins and cellular waste.
usage: Decoct the roots for 20 minutes. Drink 2 cups daily for a 3-week cleansing cycle.

name: The Female Hormone Balancer
description: Supports the liver in processing excess estrogen and balances the progesterone-estrogen ratio.
usage: Take Vitex daily in the morning. Use the other herbs as a tea during the second half of the cycle.

name: The Iron-Rich Blood Builder
description: A highly bioavailable herbal iron source that does not cause constipation.
usage: Prepare as a strong infusion or a herbal syrup with molasses. Take 2 tablespoons daily.

name: The Urinary Tract Defense
description: An antibacterial and soothing blend for the bladder and kidneys.
usage: Drink 1 cup every 3 hours during acute infection. Do not use Uva Ursi for more than 7 days.

name: The Pancreatic Support
description: Helps stabilize blood sugar and supports the endocrine function of the pancreas.
usage: Take as a tea 20 minutes before meals. Gymnema can temporarily 'mask' the taste of sugar.

name: The DNA Integrity Elixir
description: A 'Master Series' blend designed to reduce oxidative stress at the chromosomal level and support cellular longevity.
usage: Decoct Astragalus and He Shou Wu for 30 minutes. Add Goji and Pine bark. Drink 1 cup every morning for 90 days.

name: The Enzyme Production Boost
description: Stimulates the exocrine function of the pancreas to improve the breakdown of fats and proteins.
usage: Prepare as a bitter tincture. Take 5-10 drops on the tongue 10 minutes before the heaviest meal of the day.

name: The Deep Nerve Insulator
description: A high-lipid herbal protocol intended to provide the building blocks for nerve sheath repair.
usage: Mix Lion's Mane and Lecithin into a fatty medium (like coconut milk). Take alongside Gotu Kola tea twice daily.

name: The Endocrine Master-Clock
description: Helps reset the circadian rhythm and the master hormonal signaling from the brain.
usage: Standard infusion. Must be taken at the exact same time every morning to synchronize with the body's rhythms.

name: The Deep Tissue Drainage
description: For 'woody' edema and chronic lymph blockages that do not respond to simple diuretics.
usage: Use primarily as a tincture due to the potency of Stillingia and Blue Flag. 5 drops 3 times daily.

name: The Soft Tissue Decalcifier
description: Targets calcium deposits in inappropriate places like joints, arteries, and kidneys.
usage: Decoct roots for 20 minutes. Add fresh lemon juice to each cup. Drink 3 cups daily.

name: The Stroke Recovery & Prevention Blend
description: A powerful circulatory stimulant that specifically targets the smaller capillaries of the brain.
usage: Prepare as a tincture or tea. Take in the morning. Note: Monitor blood pressure as it increases peripheral flow.

name: The Red Cell Foundation
description: Deeply nourishing formula for the bone marrow to stimulate blood cell production.
usage: Simmer roots into a concentrated decoction, strain, and mix with molasses. 1 tbsp twice daily.

name: The Cortisol Balancer
description: Specifically targets the adrenal cortex to modulate the output of stress hormones.
usage: Best taken as a dual-extract (tincture and tea combination). Take before 12 PM to avoid sleep disruption.

name: The Cellular 'Sea' Wash
description: Cleanses the fluid surrounding the cells (interstitial fluid) to improve waste removal.
usage: A 'long-haul' tea. Drink 1 liter of this mild infusion daily for 6 weeks.

name: The Glaucoma Support Wash
description: A rare external wash used to help reduce intraocular pressure through osmosis and cooling.
usage: Boil, filter perfectly through a coffee filter. Use in an eye-cup once daily.

name: The Post-Antibiotic Restoration
description: A prebiotic-rich herbal liquid to help 're-grow' the internal garden.
usage: Decoct roots. The mucilage and inulin act as a 'scaffold' for beneficial bacteria to latch onto.

name: The Internal Magnet
description: A binding protocol for deep-seated industrial toxins and heavy metals.
usage: Mix 1 tsp of clay and husks in a large glass of water. Drink fast. Follow with another glass of water immediately.

name: The Glandular Softener
description: An iodine-rich and lymphatic-stimulating protocol for benign thyroid nodules.
usage: Drink the tea blend daily. Apply Castor oil packs to the thyroid area for 30 mins, 3 times a week.

name: The Vertebral Fluid Support
description: A mineral-heavy blend designed to encourage the hydration of spinal discs.
usage: Long-infusion (4-8 hours). The silica and minerals are essential for collagen cross-linking in the discs.

name: The Aneurysm Prevention Blend
description: Strengthens the connective tissue layers of the major arteries.
usage: Simmer berries and bark for 20 mins. Add leaves. Drink 2 cups daily long-term.

name: The Deep Infection Drawer
description: A very powerful external application for deep-seated pulmonary infections.
usage: Apply over the back (lung area) as a warm poultice. Must be kept warm with a heating pad or hot water bottle.

name: The Cell-Power Multiplier
description: Herbs that stimulate the body to create new mitochondria and improve oxygen usage.
usage: Combine Japanese Knotweed and Rhodiola as a tea. Consume alongside fresh green pepper juice.

name: The Gut-Brain Axis Repair
description: Targets the physical health of the vagus nerve to improve digestive and cardiac signaling.
usage: Drink as a warm tea 30 minutes before sleep or during high-stress periods.

name: The Mental Sharpness Blend
description: Specifically for age-related cognitive decline where circulation and plaque are factors.
usage: Infuse Sage and Rosemary. Take Lion's Mane as a concentrate. Use daily without fail.
